original_text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.
korean_text: 또한 외인에게서도 선한 증거를 얻은 자라야 할지니 비방과 마귀의 올무에 빠질까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: Moreover he must have a good report
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그는 좋은 평판을 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and the snare of the devil
